str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
An outburst of passion, wrath. From thuo; passion.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To cry aloud, shriek. A primary verb; properly, to 'croak' or scream, i.e. to call aloud.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
Probably from the same as artemon; prompt; Artemis, the name of a Grecian goddess borrowed by the Asiatics for one of their deities.
Ephesian, of Ephesus. From Ephesos; an Ephesian or inhabitant of Ephesus.
